title: Rational Functions - Asymptotes and Zeros - Part C

content.question: Part C Determine if the graph of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>t</mi> </math> has any horizontal asymptotes or slant asymptotes. Write equations for those asymptotes, or state that no horizontal asymptotes or slant asymptotes exist. Give a reason for your answer.

frqParts.text: Part C Determine if the graph of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>t</mi> </math> has any horizontal asymptotes or slant asymptotes. Write equations for those asymptotes, or state that no horizontal asymptotes or slant asymptotes exist. Give a reason for your answer.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
